header.underLogoSign: We rent apartments daily Odessa, Arcadia<0/>We have been successfully running our business for {{years}} years!

aboutUs.text: Hello!<0/>We are glad to welcome you to our daily rent website.<0/><0/>The apartments that we offer are located in the TOP locations of Odessa, the sunny south of Ukraine.<0/>District for rest - Arcadia<0/>First line from the sea.<0/><0/>New residential complex Gagarin Plaza. Large closed territory, underground parking.<0/><0/>5-6 minutes walk to the sea<0/>Near our complex:<0/>Shopping center, cafes, restaurants. Water park and casino.<0/>Night clubs and children's entertainment complex.<0/>Large park area.<0/>Convenient transportation interchange, final stop for shuttle buses and public transport.<0/><0/>Apartments vary in size and may differ in the number of beds and view.<0/><0/>They mostly come with panoramic glazing.<0/>There are some with a beautiful view of the city and Arcadia.<0/>There are also some with a stunning view of the sea!<0/><0/>Everything is thought out for your comfortable stay.<0/>From kitchenware to iron and hair dryer.<0/><0/>We have been engaged in daily rent for {{years}} years and are ready to organize your stay in Odessa with maximum comfort.<0/><0/>Guests often become our regular customers because the convenient location of the complex is combined with the professional individual approach of our managers to each guest.<0/><0/>Coziness, cleanliness and comfort - this is about us!

footer.description: Daily apartment rental in Odesa for tourists and city residents.

reservationComponent.apartmentNotValid: This apartment does not match your search
reservationComponent.agreeWithRules: You agree to our accommodation rules and terms of use
reservationComponent.reservationSuccess: Reservation request sent. Please remember to call our manager!
reservationComponent.reservationError: An error occurred. Please try again.
reservationComponent.checkRulesAlert: Please agree to the rules before submitting the reservation.
reservationComponent.attentionText: ATTENTION!<0 /><0 />Without a call to this number, your reservation will be canceled within an hour!<0 />Please make a call AFTER clicking the "Submit reservation request" button<0 /><0 />Phone number for reservation confirmation:<0 /><0 />
reservationComponent.modalText: Hello!<0 />Thank you for your reservation request for our apartments! We are glad you chose us and will be happy to provide you with comfortable accommodation.<0 />Apartment address:<0 />Haharinske Plateau 5/2, new residential complex “Haharin Plaza”.<0 />Important information<0 />Smoking and hosting events in our apartments is strictly prohibited.<0 />Upon check-in, you must present an original passport and leave a security deposit of 2000 UAH as a guarantee.<0 />The deposit is refunded upon check-out after inspection.<0 />Please note: in some cases the deposit amount may be increased, for example:<0 />• if you stay with pets;<0 />• if guests under 21 are not accompanied by parents.<0 />The final decision on check-in and deposit amount is made after a call with the manager.<0 />Check-in and check-out times<0 />• Check-in: from 14:30<0 />• Check-out: until 11:00<0 />Reservation confirmation<0 />To guarantee your booking, a prepayment equal to one night’s stay is required.<0 />Upon arrival, the remaining amount and the deposit are paid.<0 />How to make a prepayment?<0 />Please contact us to receive payment details and further info.<0 />If you do not get in touch within 1 hour after the request, and do not pay the prepayment within the agreed time, the reservation may be canceled.<0 />Please inform us after the payment! We will check it and confirm your reservation.<0 />Keep your receipt until check-in!<0 />Thank you for understanding! We are looking forward to your stay!<0 /><0 />
